Name: Refine User Stories
Description: Go through the existing user stories and add more detail.

Name: Design Onboarding Flow
Description: Create mockups for the new user onboarding process.

Name: Implement Push Notifications
Description: Code the functionality for sending push notifications.

Name: Write Unit Tests
Description: Develop automated tests for the core modules.

Name: Review Backend API
Description: Check the documentation and test the existing API endpoints.

Name: Create Tutorial Videos
Description: Record short videos explaining key features.

Name: Update Documentation
Description: Write and revise the user and developer documentation.

Name: Optimize Database Queries
Description: Improve the performance of frequently used database queries.

Name: Integrate Payment Gateway
Description: Connect the application with the chosen payment provider.

Name: Accessibility Audit
Description: Check the application for WCAG compliance.
